configuration:
dfs.nameservices ldcluster
dfs.ha.namenodes.ldcluster master,slave1
dfs.namenode.name.dir /data/name
dfs.datanode.data.dir /data/data
dfs.namenode.rpc-address.ldcluster.master master:8020
dfs.namenode.rpc-address.ldcluster.slave1 slave1:8020
# master和slave1的http地址
dfs.namenode.http-address.ldcluster.master master:9870
dfs.namenode.http-address.ldcluster.slave1 slave1:9870
# 3台JournalNode地址，后台跟名字， # 但后面的名字不能与nameService相同
dfs.namenode.shared.edits.dir qjournal://master:8485;slave2:8485; slave1:8485/ldcluster5200
# 配置客户端调用接口
dfs.client.failover.proxy.provider.ldcluster org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server. namenode.ha.ConfiguredFailoverProxyProvider
dfs.ha.fencing.methods sshfence
dfs.ha.fencing.ssh.private-key-files /home/zhangyu/.ssh/id_dsa
dfs.ha.fencing.methods sshfence
dfs.ha.fencing.ssh.connect-timeout 30000
#配置journalnode目录
dfs.journalnode.edits.dir /opt/hadoop/journaldata
dfs.ha.automatic-failover.enabled true
